name: B L O C K E R
name_original: B L O C K E R
description:
This is a fast paced 3D platformer. The objective of the game is to shoot the green cubes. Here's the catch: every 3 seconds a cube spawn above your head that you need to dodge. It is a very simple concept but quickly becomes difficult. I did not have time to optimize it, as it was made for a game jam, so it requires a decent PC to run it.

sound effect credit: "Bike, Bell Ding, Single, 01-01.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
